content.html:
I modified the script to use non versioned debbuilder when branch is 0.x afa71ab. The `0-debbuilder` should be an exception handled by the ignition_debbuild variable.

Tested: https://build.osrfoundation.org/view/debbuild/job/ign-tools-debbuilder/

Added items:
    GeneratedJob{name='ign-tools-debbuilder'}
Disabled items:
    GeneratedJob{name='ign-tools0-debbuilder'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ign-gui0-debbuilder'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ign-rendering0-debbuilder'}
    GeneratedJob{name='ign-plugin0-debbuilder'}
